TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationTextAttribute extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier

remarks.format:
## Remarks Derived from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier>.
The list of text attributes supported by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] can be found at <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
The AutomationTextAttribute class is effectively abstract, as it has no constructor and cannot be instantiated by applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationTextAttribute LookupById(int32 id) cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.
Docs.returns: Retrieves a that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.
